name: The Orcs Strike Back!
description:
The elves are rich, spoiled, arrogant. For centuries they have oppressed the Orcs, forcing them into the distant and barely habitable corners of the earth while the elves themselves lived comfortably.

No more!

Brave Orcs! Gather your tribes! Raise up your clubs! March on the elves and take back your homelands!

In The Orcs Strike Back!, bring balance back to the world as you grow your tribe, gather weapons, attack the elves, and pillage their villages. Take them as prisoners and force them to fight for you, burn down their homes, and win back the lands of your ancestors!
